messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1642
messages.msgSnippet: Thomas Armstrong wrote In Their Own Way and Seven Kinds of Smart which present the practical use of the theory of multiple intelligences for parents. The
messages.messageBody:
Thomas Armstrong wrote "In Their Own Way" and "Seven Kinds of Smart" which
present the practical use of the theory of multiple intelligences for
parents. The books are based on the research work of Howard Gardner,
especially as presented in his book "Frames of Mind". Martin Gardner is the
author of numerous books of mathematical puzzles and other interesting
subjects, not including multiple intelligences.

Deborah in IL who had to check the book covers for spelling herself :-)

**I think the author is Martin Gardner, or Gardener. HeÂ’s written several

books on that.**


Elsa Haas



**Also, have you read the book - can't think of the name - on seven types of

intelligence? Somebody here will know it - focus on her strengths, believe

in her....and let her know. And try to let go of *your* goals for her.**
